articles.author: Carolyn Collins Petersen
articles.title: European Satellite Measures Exactly How Much Ice Has Been Lost from Glaciers - Universe Today
articles.description: ESA's CryoSat gives valuable data that allows scientists to estimate the total ice loss from glaciers around the world.
articles.content: As global warming heats up our atmosphere a degree at a time, the world’s glaciers are paying the price. In ten years, they’ve shrunk by a total of 2 percent. To look at it another way, collectively … [+5207 chars]
